user.title: Add Area Tree - Select Type
user.description: Area Tree allows areas and floors to be extended to a full hierarchy. You can start with an existing area or floor.

menu_options.area: Tree Node associated with an existing Area
menu_options.floor: Tree Node associated with an existing Floor

area.title: Add Area Tree - Select Area
area.description: Select an area to associate with the tree.

floor.title: Add Area Tree - Select Floor
floor.description: Select a floor to associate with the tree.
